text: In Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2, the anthropomorphic tree - man Groot is no longer the towering, full - sized version voiced by Vin Diesel in the first film, but rather a pint - sized pipsqueak known as Baby Groot. This is because [ clears throat for spoilers ] according to writer and director James Gunn, the Groot we knew is dead. At the end of the first Guardians of the Galaxy, Groot wraps his tree - limbs into a sturdy wooden bubble to protect his pals as their ship falls from the sky. When it crashes, he shatters into a pile of kindling. His friends mourn, his partner Rocket plucks a twig from the wreckage, and regrows Groot into a dancing sprout. By
